00020 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 XTDS::XTDS(const char *name, bool runtime,
00022            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00023            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00024            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00025            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00026     XCharDeviceDriver<XDSO>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers) {
00027     const char* ch[] = {"CH1", "CH2", "CH3", "CH4", "MATH1", "MATH2", 0L};
00028     for(int i = 0; ch[i]; i++)
00029     {
00030         trace1()->add(ch[i]);
00031         trace2()->add(ch[i]);
00032         trace3()->add(ch[i]);
00033         trace4()->add(ch[i]);
00034     }
00035     const char* sc[] = {"0.02", "0.05", "0.1", "0.2", "0.5", "1", "2", "5", "10",
00036                         "20", "50", "100", 0L};
00037     for(int i = 0; sc[i]; i++)
00038     {
00039         vFullScale1()->add(sc[i]);
00040         vFullScale2()->add(sc[i]);
00041         vFullScale3()->add(sc[i]);
00042         vFullScale4()->add(sc[i]);
00043     }
00044     const char* tr[] = {"EXT", "EXT10", "CH1", "CH2", "CH3", "CH4", "LINE", 0L};
00045     for(int i = 0; tr[i]; i++)
00046     {
00047         trigSource()->add(tr[i]);
00048     }
00049 
00050     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(20); //20msec
00051     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeSPoll(10); //10msec
00052 
00053     recordLength()->value(10000);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void
00057 XTDS::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00058 {
00059     interface()->send("HEADER ON");
00060     interface()->query("ACQ:STOPAFTER?");
00061     char buf[10];
00062     if(interface()->scanf(":ACQ%*s %9s", buf) != 1)
00063         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00064     singleSequence()->value(!strncmp(buf, "SEQ", 3));
00065   
00066     interface()->query("ACQ:MODE?");
00067     if(interface()->scanf(":ACQ%*s %9s", buf) != 1)
00068         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00069     if(!strncmp(buf, "AVE", 3))
00070     {
00071         interface()->query("ACQ:NUMAVG?");
00072         int x;
00073         if(interface()->scanf(":ACQ%*s %d", &x) != 1)
00074             throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00075         average()->value(x);
00076     }
00077     if(!strncmp(buf, "SAM", 3))
00078         average()->value(1);
00079     interface()->send("DATA:ENC RPB;WIDTH 2"); //MSB first RIB
00080   
00081     start();
00082 }
00083 void 
00084 XTDS::onAverageChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00085     if(*average() == 1)
00086     {
00087         interface()->send("ACQ:MODE SAMPLE");
00088 
00089     }
00090 
00091     else
00092     {
00093         interface()->send("ACQ:MODE AVE;NUMAVG " + average()->to_str());
00094     }
00095 }
00096 
00097 void
00098 XTDS::onSingleChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00099 {
00100     if(*singleSequence())
00101     {
00102         interface()->send("ACQ:STOPAFTER SEQUENCE;STATE ON");
00103     }
00104     else
00105     {
00106         interface()->send("ACQ:STOPAFTER RUNSTOP;STATE ON");
00107     }
00108 }
00109 void
00110 XTDS::onTrigSourceChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00111 {
00112     interface()->send("TRIG:A:EDG:SOU " + trigSource()->to_str());
00113 }
00114 void
00115 XTDS::onTrigPosChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00116 {
00117     if(*trigPos() >= 0)
00118         interface()->sendf("HOR:DELAY:STATE OFF;TIME %.2g", (double)*trigPos());
00119     else
00120         interface()->sendf("HOR:DELAY:STATE ON;TIME %.2g", -(*trigPos() - 50.0)/100.0* *timeWidth());    
00121 }
00122 void
00123 XTDS::onTrigLevelChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00124 {
00125     interface()->sendf("TRIG:A:EDG:LEV %g", (double)*trigLevel());
00126 }
00127 void
00128 XTDS::onTrigFallingChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00129 {
00130     interface()->sendf("TRIG:A:EDG:SLOP %s", (*trigFalling() ? "FALL" : "RISE"));
00131 }

00133 XTDS::onTimeWidthChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00134 {
00135     interface()->sendf("HOR:MAIN:SCALE %.1g", (double)*timeWidth()/10.0);
00136 }

00138 XTDS::onVFullScale1Changed(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)

00142     interface()->sendf("%s:SCALE %.1g", ch.c_str(), atof(vFullScale1()->to_str().c_str())/10.0);
00143 }

00205 void
00206 XTDS::startSequence()
00207 {                      
00208     interface()->send("ACQ:STATE ON");
00209 }

00211 
00212 int
00213 XTDS::acqCount(bool *seq_busy)
00214 {
00215     interface()->query("ACQ:NUMACQ?;:BUSY?");
00216     int n;
00217     int busy;
00218     if(interface()->scanf(":ACQ%*s %d;:BUSY %d", &n, &busy) != 2)
00219         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00220     *seq_busy = busy;
00221     return n;
00222 }
00223 
00224 double
00225 XTDS::getTimeInterval()
00226 {
00227     interface()->query("WFMP?");
00228     char *cp = strstr(&interface()->buffer()[0], "XIN");
00229     if(!cp) throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00230     double x;
00231     int ret = sscanf(cp, "%*s %lf", &x);
00232     if(ret != 1) throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00233     return x;
00234 }
00235 
00236 void
00237 XTDS::getWave(std::deque<XString> &channels)
00238 {
00239     XScopedLock<XInterface> lock(*interface());
00240     int pos = 1;
00241     int width = 20000;
00242     for(std::deque<XString>::iterator it = channels.begin();
00243         it != channels.end(); it++)
00244     {
00245         int rsize = (2 * width + 1024);
00246         interface()->sendf("DATA:SOURCE %s;START %u;STOP %u;:WAVF?",
00247                            (const char *)it->c_str(),
00248                            pos, pos + width);
00249         interface()->receive(rsize);
00250         rawData().insert(rawData().end(), 
00251                          interface()->buffer().begin(), interface()->buffer().end());
00252     }
00253 }
00254 void
00255 XTDS::convertRaw() throw (XRecordError&) {
00256     double xin = 0;
00257     double yin[256], yoff[256];
00258     int width = 0;
00259     double xoff = 0;
00260     int triggerpos;
00261 
00262     int size = rawData().size();
00263     std::vector<char> bufcpy(rawData());
00264     bufcpy.push_back('\0');
00265     char *buf = &bufcpy[0];
00266   
00267     int ch_cnt = 0;
00268     //scan # of channels etc.
00269     char *cp = buf;
00270     for(;;)
00271     {
00272         if(cp >= &buf[size]) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00273         if(*cp == ':') cp++;
00274         if(!strncasecmp(cp, "XIN", 3))
00275             sscanf(cp, "%*s %lf", &xin);
00276         if(!strncasecmp(cp, "PT_O", 4))
00277             sscanf(cp, "%*s %d", &triggerpos);
00278         if(!strncasecmp(cp, "XZE", 3))
00279             sscanf(cp, "%*s %lf", &xoff);
00280         if(!strncasecmp(cp, "YMU", 3))
00281             sscanf(cp, "%*s %lf", &yin[ch_cnt - 1]);
00282         if(!strncasecmp(cp, "YOF", 3))
00283             sscanf(cp, "%*s %lf", &yoff[ch_cnt - 1]);
00284         if(!strncasecmp(cp, "NR_P", 4))
00285         {
00286             ch_cnt++;
00287             sscanf(cp, "%*s %d", &width);
00288         }
00289         if(!strncasecmp(cp, "CURV", 4))
00290         {
00291             for(;;)
00292             {
00293                 cp = index(cp, '#');
00294                 if(!cp) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00295                 int x;
00296                 if(sscanf(cp, "#%1d", &x) != 1) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00297                 char fmt[9];
00298                 if(snprintf(fmt, sizeof(fmt), "#%%*1d%%%ud", x) < 0)
00299                     throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00300                 int yyy;
00301                 if(sscanf(cp, fmt, &yyy) != 1) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00302                 if(yyy == 0) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00303                 cp += 2 + x;
00304            
00305                 cp += yyy;
00306                 if(*cp != ',') break;
00307             }
00308         }
00309         char *ncp = index(cp, ';');
00310         if(!ncp)
00311             cp = index(cp, ':');
00312         else
00313             cp = ncp;
00314         if(!cp) break;
00315         cp++;
00316     }
00317     if((width <= 0) || (width > size/2)) throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00318 
00319     if(triggerpos != 0)
00320         xoff = -triggerpos * xin;
00321 
00322     setParameters(ch_cnt, xoff, xin, width);
00323   
00324     cp = buf;
00325     for(int j = 0; j < ch_cnt; j++)
00326     {
00327         double *wave = waveDisp(j);
00328         cp = index(cp, '#');
00329         if(!cp) break;
00330         int x;
00331         if(sscanf(cp, "#%1d", &x) != 1) break;
00332         char fmt[9];
00333         if(snprintf(fmt, sizeof(fmt), "#%%*1d%%%ud", x) < 0)
00334             throw XBufferUnderflowRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00335         int yyy;
00336         if(sscanf(cp, fmt, &yyy) != 1) break;
00337         if(yyy == 0) break;
00338         cp += 2 + x;
00339                 
00340 
00341         int i = 0;
00342         for(; i < std::min(width, yyy/2); i++)
00343         {
00344             double val = *((unsigned char *)cp) * 0x100;
00345             val += *((unsigned char *)cp + 1);
00346             *(wave++) = yin[j] * (val - yoff[j] - 0.5);
00347             cp += 2;
00348         }
00349         for(; i < width; i++) {
00350             *(wave++) = 0.0;
00351         }
00352     }  
00353 }
